name: Hacker Breakfast - Enter The Flow State
description:
A strategic breakfast gathering with Flow & LayerZero core teams to sharpen your winning edge before the hackathon.

This isn't just another breakfast—it's your secret weapon for hackathon success. Connect directly with Flow and LayerZero teams, refine your ideas, and build the connections that could make your project stand out.

What to expect:
* Direct access to Flow and LayerZero experts
* Early insights into bounties and judging criteria
* Opportunity to pitch and refine your ideas
* Network with potential teammates
* Fuel up with quality food and coffee

Perfect for:
* Hackathon participants looking to maximize their chances
* Teams seeking technical guidance
* Developers wanting to learn more about Flow and LayerZero
* Anyone interested in building the future of Web3

Don't miss this chance to get ahead of the competition and make your hackathon experience count!
